oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John McEwen
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A seated portrait of Col. John Lapsley McEwen (1822-1864) in military attire. His uniform has several rows of buttons and a striped collar. He has a beard.
Confederate officer, Civil War; wounded at Drewry's Bluff, Virginia, May 16, 1864, died May 27, 1864 in Richmond.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Van Stavoren, J.H.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: McEwen, John
Armed Forces—Officers; Beards; Buttons; Collars
Military officers; Uniforms; Soldiers; Military personnel; Military officers; Military uniform
